lines:
1986

September 25, 1911.

Mr. S. C. Luka

224 North Wayne Strost,

Angola, Indiana,

My dear Luki

Thanks for your no te. I en inclosing check for $100. herawith as 
Kindly sign and return the inclosed receipt.

requested.

Accept my best wishes for success in the new life, and when you can

spare time Later let me have a word telling me how things are going with you.

Very gingeraly yours,

Principalo
raw: 1986 September 25, 1911. Mr. S. C. Luka 224 North Wayne Strost, Angola, Indiana, My dear Luki Thanks for your no te. I en inclosing check for $100. herawith as Kindly sign and return the inclosed receipt. requested. Accept my best wishes for success in the new life, and when you can spare time Later let me have a word telling me how things are going with you. Very gingeraly yours, Principalo
